data.name: Pro Soccer Online
data.detailed_description:
Pro Soccer Online is a 1st/3rd person, highly skill based, online multiplayer soccer game. It offers a sports game experience unlike any other with smooth, physics based, input driven gameplay that is competitive and rewarding with no pay to win mechanics.

What makes Pro Soccer Online so good?

1) Input Driven Gameplay

Gameplay in Pro Soccer Online is completely input driven, not animation driven like many other sports games. Your decisions and skills on the field are the only thing that matter in this game.

2) Dedicated servers

Pro Soccer Online has dedicated servers in NA (Ohio), SA (Sao Paulo), EU (Milan), and AS (Seoul), and AU (Sydney).

3) Ranked Modes

Ranked modes allow you to queue solo, with friends or as a full team and get matched up against other players. It has stat tracking as well as an overall rating system with leaderboards. Climb the ranks, become the best and show off your profile.

4) Custom Lobbies

Custom lobbies are available to all players so you can setup a match to be just how you like it. It's great for hosting private matches and offers more options than matchmaking. There is overtime, single keeper mode, team sizes from 3v3 all the way up to a full size match of 11v11.
5) Player customization

Customize your player in different ways like choosing your hair and facial hair style, hair and facial hair color, make your own custom shoe design, choose different shirt styles, gloves wristbands, etc.

6) No pay to win mechanics

Pro Soccer Online aims to be the most competitive and satisfying sports gaming experience there is. Having pay to win would completely ruin that. There are no pay to win mechanics in Pro Soccer Online.

data.short_description: Pro Soccer Online is a 1st/3rd person, highly skill based, online multiplayer soccer game. It offers a sports game experience unlike any other with smooth, physics based, input driven gameplay that is competitive and rewarding with no pay to win mechanics.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor at 2.5 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any DirectX 11 or 12 compatible card for Windows
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
